org.apache.manifoldcf.core.interfaces

Interface IAuthorizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminProfile, APIProfile

    public interface IAuthorizer
    An instance of this interface authorizes a user to perform various capabilities within MCF, within the local thread scope.

    • Field Summary
